pr_title: Auto Query Fixer: implement Tokenize and some utils functions in ZetaSQL Helper server

timeline.message:
Develop Tokenize method
Util function are developed for future features
Test case are included.

timeline.bodyText: curious what is this used for?
timeline.author: kikkyo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,6 +25,19 @@ cc_grpc_library(
     deps = [":local_service_cc_proto"],
 )
 
+cc_library(
+    name = "local_service",
+    srcs = ["local_service.cc"],
+    hdrs = ["local_service.h"],
+    copts = ["-Wno-sign-compare"],

replies.bodyText: I took this compiler options from the ZetaSQL BUILD file. I guess it asks the compiler not to care about the sign of data types.
replies.author: mingen-pan
